channel.title: CVE Feed for victorfreitas -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for victorfreitas -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-4997|2024-08-01T20:55:10.436Z -- victorfreitas -- wpupper%20share%20buttons
item.description: The WPUpper Share Buttons plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data when preparing sharing links for posts and pages in all versions up to, and including, 3.43. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to obtain the contents of password protected posts and pages.

item.title: CVE-2024-4997|2024-06-04T17:55:58.306Z -- victorfreitas -- wpupper%20share%20buttons
item.description: The WPUpper Share Buttons plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data when preparing sharing links for posts and pages in all versions up to, and including, 3.43.
